Ao: By clicking on the delete championship button, you will be starting the process of
Certifique: Make sure you really want to proceed before making this decision.
TextoExclusao: this championship, it will be removed from view and it will not be possible to recover it. You must carefully assess whether this is what you really want to do.

ImagemTamanho: Invalid file! The file can't be bigger than 5mb and be of the following types: png, jpeg, jpg, webp, gif, bmp, tiff

PesquiseSuborg: Search for the name of a user you want to add as a sub-host
avisoSubOrg: Please be aware that sub-organisers do not have permission to delete the championship and also do not have the ability to add or remove other sub-organisers.
DropZoneText: Drag and drop the image here
TextoCriarModalChaveamento1: Please be aware that once the bracket is created, you won't be able to change any of the championship settings.
TextoCriarModalChaveamento2: If you wish to edit the championship settings later on, you will need to delete the bracket, which will result in the removal of all generated matches.
TextoCriarModalChaveamento3: Do you still wish to proceed and create the bracket with the current settings?
TextoExcluirModalChaveamento1: Please be aware that once the bracket is deleted, you won't be able to view the generated matches anymore.
TextoExcluirModalChaveamento2: If you wish to view the matches again, you will need to create a new bracket, which will result in new matches.
TextoExcluirModalChaveamento3: Do you still wish to proceed and delete the bracket?
TextoModalChaveamentoSucesso: Congratulations! Your bracket has been successfully created.

TeamChampionshipChangeWarning: It is not possible to change the championship's sport after its registration.
